title: Protests continue blocking main roads
body_lines: Protests continued throughout the country today over the fuel price hike, shortage of fuel and demanding the resignation of the current government, including the President.
Traffic on the A9 and A6 roads in Dambulla was severely disrupted due to a protest while the main road along the Colombo Galle road was also blocked from Panadura Town.
Also, the protesters were crossing the Galle-Colombo road at Balapitiya and Ambalangoda.
